resources.string: Enable accessibility in the settings screen for %1$s to show movie ratings in %2$s
%1$s needs permission to draw over other apps to show movie ratings when you\'re browsing %2$s

Turn ON the accessibility for Flutter to get movie ratings while you're browsing. It helps Flutter to get the name of the movie from the app.

 Once you turn on the button, Android will show you a dialog which will give you info about what Flutter will get access to. But don't worry. Flutter is cool and believes in personal privacy and hence collects no personal data.


 If you want to turn Flutter off for a particular app, click on 'SETTINGS' on top and you can enable/disable Flutter for particular apps.
Flutter requires accessibility to get movie names from the app.
Select the apps you want to see movie ratings for
